txt.en: DNT the hobbits welcome you
Instance: World Behind and Home Ahead
'Ha ha!'
'DNT - Blah!'
'Hoho!'
'DNT - hai hobbit!'
'You have got it more rightly than you imagine, Gimli the Dwarf.'
'And after that, the plate of greens.'
'What an adventure it has been, friends -- and how glad I shall be to go home.'
'Frodo, I could not agree with you more.'
Pippin and Merry have gathered 'the fellowship and everyone else who really mattered' in BÃ¢r Thorenion for a meal and good cheer.
DNT - Blah!
Take your place among the guests.
'Well said, Sam! Better than I could have said it, by far.'
'I hope you aren't mocking me, Mr. Merry'
'Now that we know you well, Sam, we would not dare to do so.'
'And I say you are quite welcome.'
'And now you really are mocking me now, Mr. Ar-- I mean Your Liege.'
'He only mocks in part, and the lesser part at that.'
'Oh, leave Samwise be and pass the gravy this way, will you?'
'Ha ha ha. There, do you see, Sam?'
'And that is Hobbits for you -- as loyal to their friends as their gravy.'
'Ah ha ha.'
Take your place
